ISSUE.TITLE: deploy seaweedfs use seaweedfs-compose.yml, but cronjob service not start
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** I use [docker-compose](https://github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/blob/master/docker/seaweedfs-compose.yml) to start SeaweedFS. but `cronjob` service not start successfully. others start successfully. **Expected behavior** cronjob start successfully. **Screenshots** ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22998204/144028831-de957b09-e870-4dec-a22d-2f354f274bb5.png) is there something wrong?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: volume: fix loading old volume format fix https://github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/issues/2487

COMMIT.MESSAGE: deprecate all cronjob module related code related to https://github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/issues/2483
